section.name: java.util.Collection Extensions
section.p: Adds various function extensions to java.util.List implementations.

td.dd: Provides the current size of the collection.
Iterates through the collection and for each element, calls the passed function with the element as the parameter.
Finds the first item selected by the passed function.
Finds all items selected by the passed function.

section.name: length
section.p: Provides the current size of the collection. Alternative to the size() method to be more consistent with Javascript arrays.

section.name: each
section.p: Iterates through the collection and for each element, calls the passed function with the element as the parameter.

section.name: find
section.p: Finds the first item selected by the passed function. The function will receive the item and should return true or false for the result.

section.name: findAll
section.p: Finds all items selected by the passed function. The function will receive the item and should return true or false for the result. A list of all matches will be returned.
